tasks.title: Setup Project Repository
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Prisma ORM.
tasks.details: Create a new Next.js project. Install Tailwind CSS for styling. Set up Prisma ORM for database interactions. Configure basic project structure and version control.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify project setup by running a basic Next.js page and checking Prisma connection to a local PostgreSQL instance.

tasks.title: Configure Authentication with Better Auth
tasks.description: Integrate Better Auth for user authentication and management.
tasks.details: Set up Better Auth provider. Implement signup, login, and logout flows. Secure API routes with authentication middleware.
tasks.testStrategy: Test user registration, login, and protected route access. Verify session management and error handling.

subtasks.title: Install Better Auth Package
subtasks.description: Add Better Auth to both client and server parts of the project
subtasks.details: Install the Better Auth package using npm, yarn, or other package manager in both client and server parts of the project
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify package installation by checking package.json and node_modules

subtasks.title: Configure Environment Variables
subtasks.description: Set up required environment variables for Better Auth
subtasks.details: Create a .env file in the project root and add necessary environment variables including a secret key and base URL
subtasks.testStrategy: Confirm environment variables are properly loaded in the application

subtasks.title: Create Auth Instance
subtasks.description: Initialize Better Auth instance in the application
subtasks.details: Create an auth.ts file in the appropriate location (project root, lib/, or utils/ folder) to import Better Auth and create the auth instance
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify the auth instance is properly exported and accessible

subtasks.title: Set Up Database Configuration
subtasks.description: Configure database for storing user authentication data
subtasks.details: Configure Better Auth to use SQLite, PostgreSQL, MySQL, or another database through Kysely or appropriate adapters
subtasks.testStrategy: Test database connection and verify schema creation

subtasks.title: Create API Handler for Authentication
subtasks.description: Implement route handler for authentication API requests
subtasks.details: Set up a route handler to serve POST and GET requests to the /api/auth endpoint using the handler provided by Better Auth
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API endpoints for authentication functionality

subtasks.title: Implement Authentication Flows
subtasks.description: Create signup, login, and logout functionality in the application
subtasks.details: Implement user interface components and logic for signup, login, and logout flows, and secure API routes with authentication middleware
subtasks.testStrategy: Test complete authentication flows including signup, login, logout, and secured route access

tasks.title: Design and Implement User Data Model
tasks.description: Define and implement the User data model in Prisma.
tasks.details: Create Prisma schema for User, including username, email, apiKey, deliveryOptions, organization, referrals, createdAt, and updatedAt fields. Generate and run migrations.
tasks.testStrategy: Test CRUD operations on User model. Validate uniqueness constraints and field types.

tasks.title: Build Username Claiming System
tasks.description: Implement username claiming during signup.
tasks.details: Add username field to signup form. Validate uniqueness and format. Store claimed username in User model.
tasks.testStrategy: Test username validation, uniqueness, and assignment during signup. Verify error messages for taken usernames.

tasks.title: Implement GET Endpoint for Contact Form
tasks.description: Create a GET endpoint at hi.new/{username} to display a simple contact form.
tasks.details: Build Next.js API route for GET requests. Render a minimalist contact form. Ensure mobile responsiveness and accessibility.
tasks.testStrategy: Test endpoint accessibility, form rendering, and mobile responsiveness. Validate WCAG compliance.

tasks.title: Implement POST Endpoint for Message Submission
tasks.description: Create a POST endpoint at hi.new/{username} to accept structured JSON data.
tasks.details: Build Next.js API route for POST requests. Parse and validate incoming JSON. Store message details for delivery.
tasks.testStrategy: Test endpoint with valid and invalid payloads. Verify validation, error handling, and response format.

tasks.title: Integrate Resend for Email Delivery
tasks.description: Set up Resend for forwarding messages to email.
tasks.details: Configure Resend API. Implement email template. Send email on message submission. Handle delivery status.
tasks.testStrategy: Test email delivery with various inputs. Verify delivery status and error handling.

tasks.title: Implement Basic Rate Limiting
tasks.description: Add rate limiting to prevent abuse of endpoints.
tasks.details: Implement IP-based rate limiting for anonymous requests. Use Upstash for distributed rate limiting if needed.
tasks.testStrategy: Test rate limiting by exceeding limits and verifying error responses.

tasks.title: Design and Implement DeliveryOption Model
tasks.description: Define and implement the DeliveryOption data model in Prisma.
tasks.details: Create Prisma schema for DeliveryOption, including userId, type (EMAIL, WEBHOOK), destination, active, createdAt, and updatedAt fields. Generate and run migrations.
tasks.testStrategy: Test CRUD operations on DeliveryOption model. Validate relationships and field types.

tasks.title: Build User Settings for Delivery Options
tasks.description: Allow users to configure multiple delivery destinations.
tasks.details: Create UI for managing delivery options. Allow adding, editing, and removing email/webhook destinations. Store in DeliveryOption model.
tasks.testStrategy: Test UI flows for managing delivery options. Verify persistence and validation.

tasks.title: Implement Webhook Delivery
tasks.description: Add support for forwarding messages to webhook endpoints.
tasks.details: Extend message processing to send payloads to configured webhook URLs. Handle response codes and retries.
tasks.testStrategy: Test webhook delivery with various endpoints. Verify retry logic and error handling.

tasks.title: Integrate Upstash Redis for Message Queueing
tasks.description: Set up Upstash Redis for reliable message delivery.
tasks.details: Configure Upstash Redis. Queue messages for delivery. Implement worker to process queue.
tasks.testStrategy: Test message queuing and processing. Verify delivery order and error handling.

tasks.title: Implement Retry Mechanism for Failed Deliveries
tasks.description: Add retry logic for failed message deliveries.
tasks.details: Store failed messages in temporary storage (PendingMessage model). Schedule retries with exponential backoff.
tasks.testStrategy: Test retry logic by simulating delivery failures. Verify retry scheduling and success.

tasks.title: Design and Implement PendingMessage Model
tasks.description: Define and implement the PendingMessage data model in Prisma.
tasks.details: Create Prisma schema for PendingMessage, including recipient, sender, senderEmail, message, metadata, attempts, nextAttempt, createdAt, and updatedAt fields. Generate and run migrations.
tasks.testStrategy: Test CRUD operations on PendingMessage model. Validate relationships and field types.

tasks.title: Implement API Key Generation and Management
tasks.description: Generate and manage API keys for programmatic access.
tasks.details: Add API key generation to user settings. Store keys securely. Allow users to revoke and regenerate keys.
tasks.testStrategy: Test API key generation, usage, and revocation. Verify security and uniqueness.

tasks.title: Implement Premium Username System
tasks.description: Restrict short usernames (â‰¤4 characters) to premium users.
tasks.details: Add validation for username length. Implement upgrade flow for premium usernames. Store premium status in User model.
tasks.testStrategy: Test username validation and upgrade flow. Verify premium status persistence.

tasks.title: Integrate Subscription Billing
tasks.description: Add subscription management for premium features.
tasks.details: Integrate payment provider (e.g., Stripe). Implement subscription creation, renewal, and cancellation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test subscription flows. Verify payment processing and status updates.

tasks.title: Implement Referral Program
tasks.description: Add referral tracking and rewards.
tasks.details: Create Referral model. Track referrals and rewards. Display referral status in user settings.
tasks.testStrategy: Test referral tracking and reward assignment. Verify UI updates.

tasks.title: Add Analytics for Endpoint Usage
tasks.description: Track and display endpoint usage statistics.
tasks.details: Implement analytics collection for message delivery. Display usage stats in user dashboard.
tasks.testStrategy: Test analytics collection and display. Verify data accuracy.

tasks.title: Implement Advanced Spam Prevention
tasks.description: Add additional spam detection and prevention measures.
tasks.details: Integrate spam detection libraries. Add CAPTCHA or other anti-spam measures to contact form.
tasks.testStrategy: Test spam detection and prevention. Verify effectiveness and user experience.

tasks.title: Add Custom Form Styling Options
tasks.description: Allow users to customize the appearance of their contact form.
tasks.details: Add UI for form styling. Store preferences in User model. Apply styles to endpoint UI.
tasks.testStrategy: Test form styling UI and application. Verify persistence and rendering.
